scheme: Issue of Free Bus Pass to Differently Abled Person
feedback: Maybe because we also want to get out into the world like able people can. We do have hobbies, you know. Errands to run.\r\nSince a lot of us can’t drive, this is a critical issue. We need to make it better. I’m in the US, and it really needs work.

scheme: Atal Mission For Rejuvenation And Urban Transformation
feedback: The Atal Mission has really improved the infrastructure in our city. The roads are smoother, and there's less traffic congestion.

scheme: Atal Mission For Rejuvenation And Urban Transformation
feedback: Thanks to the Atal Mission, our neighborhood now has better water supply and sanitation facilities. It has made life much easier for us.

scheme: Atal Mission For Rejuvenation And Urban Transformation
feedback: I don't see much difference in our area after the Atal Mission. The promised development seems to be slow, and there are still many issues with waste management.

scheme: Atal Mission For Rejuvenation And Urban Transformation
feedback: The construction work under the Atal Mission has caused a lot of inconvenience to residents. It's taking too long, and the dust and noise are unbearable.
